snippet.title: Shardbound Steam Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Shardbound for Free now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/586030/

Shardbound is a Tactical CCG. As you play,  you'll collect hundreds of units and build armies to compete head-to-head with other players in matches of cunning and skill. Use positioning, the terrain, and your units' unique abilities to achieve victory. 

Learn more about Shardbound: http://www.shardbound.com/

Join our Community: https://www.reddit.com/r/Shardbound/
Chat in our Discord: https://discord.gg/zwSn2Yk
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Shardbound
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/shardbound
